info.description: Build towers to annihilate your opponent
info.similarAwards:
1987 Gra Roku Game of the Year
1981 Spiel des Jahres Winner
info.ruleText:
Goal
The goal is to control the entire game board, leaving your opponent with no possible moves.
  For a fast game variant: the first player to capture 6 or more of their opponent's pieces wins. Gameplay
On your turn, you can choose one of the following actions: - Move a single piece one space - Move a pile: pile height determines the number of spaces you can move it. You can choose to move only part of a pile - Play a piece of your reserve on any space Moves can only be made in a straight line, either vertically or horizontally (not diagonally). Moves can only be made with a piece of your own color (single piece or pile with your color on top) A move can end on a single piece, a stack of pieces, or an empty space. Pieces or piles jumped over or passed over during a multiple move are not affected. If a pile has more than 5 pieces, excess pieces are removed from the bottom and become either captured or reserve pieces.
info.helpText:
- Players take seat
- On their turn, each player drags a piece/stack on the board
- Each player has two vertical holders, used for managing the personal piece reserve and the captured pieces stock

fields.text: Are you sure you want to restart the game?
